CHAT.comment: child utters something unintelligible about Firstname.
child seems to be giving another possible name.
mom simultaneously speaks.

child and mom speak to the degu.

child laughs and gets off mom's lap.

child puts car back onto the table.

mom and child laugh.
child excitedly pushes car back and forth on the table while making sound effects.
child stops moving the car.

child yells and swings the car around in the air.

mom laughs.

child puts her finger in Robodog's mouth.

Robodog gets lodged between chair and the table leg.
child presses button on top of Robodog's head repeatedly.
child plays with Robodog silently for a few seconds.
Robodog nods its head and opens its mouth.

child sticks her finger in Robodog's mouth.
